details.topic: Bundling Perl, Database, and Web components

synopsis.p: We have an old web app running using Apache, Perl and Mysql on Windows - the development server. We have a client that can't always get internet access in meetings and is hoping we can find a way to "bundle" the app for easy install on local computers. Setting the app up takes a few minutes - install Perl, install the modules, install mysql, install Apache, configure the local server. Is there some way to send a DVD to someone so they can click and install?
